sentences.en: Even very young premature babies respond to their mother's presence.
sentences.cn: 即使是很小的早产儿也会对母亲的出现做出反应。

sentences.en: he had the presence of mind to record the scene on video.
sentences.cn: 他镇定自若地用摄像机录下现场。

sentences.en: Hendrix's stage presence appealed to thousands of teenage rebels.
sentences.cn: 亨德里克斯在台上的风采吸引了成千上万的叛逆少年。

sentences.en: I still can't trust myself to remain composed in their presence.
sentences.cn: 我仍然不放心自己能否在他们面前保持镇静。

sentences.en: I suppose your presence here today is not entirely coincidental .
sentences.cn: 我认为你今天来这里不完全是碰巧。

sentences.en: In their presence I became self-conscious and tongue-tied.
sentences.cn: 当着他们的面，我有些难为情，说不出话来。

sentences.en: Nobody was allowed to eat in the Empress Dowager's presence.
sentences.cn: 在皇帝遗孀面前任何人不得进餐。

sentences.en: Stephen noticed that the people around him looked cheered by his presence.
sentences.cn: 斯蒂芬注意到，周围的人们似乎因为他的到来而受到鼓舞。

sentences.en: Suddenly, I felt a presence behind me.
sentences.cn: 突然，我感觉身后有什么东西。

sentences.en: The boy had the presence of mind to turn off the gas.
sentences.cn: 那男孩子镇定地关掉了煤气。

sentences.en: The cameras were not an intrusive presence.
sentences.cn: 那些摄像机的存在并不令人反感。

sentences.en: The constant presence of the media was very intrusive.
sentences.cn: 媒体一直在场十分令人讨厌。

sentences.en: The presence of a star is already apparent in the early film.
sentences.cn: 在早期影片中已经显露出了明星相。

sentences.en: The somewhat acid flavour is caused by the presence of lactic acid.
sentences.cn: 这种微酸的味道是因为含有乳酸造成的。

sentences.en: We had kept its presence hidden with a strategically placed chair.
sentences.cn: 我们用一张摆放得很巧妙的椅子将它隐藏了起来。

sentences.en: Your presence is requested at the club meeting on Friday.
sentences.cn: 敬请出席于周五举行的俱乐部会议。

words.tran_cn: 表象的；演出的；上演的；直觉的
提出者；推荐者；赠送者；任命者

phrases.tran_cn: 引起别人注意自己的存在，使自己对人（或形势）有强烈且明显的影响

trans.tran_cn: 出席，存在，风度，灵魂，鬼魂
trans.tran_en: when someone or something is present in a particular place
